name: Bigger is Better Maybe?
description:
With 3 days left before the jam finished and my first game jam ever I decided to join and make a quick little game. 

the goal is to go through the progressively larger doors until you reach the end by eating growth pods and growing larger so that you can fit inside the doors. 

Also you are being timed so the faster the better, i have added my dev time in game on how fast I beat it so show me if you can beat my time and you get a very good feeling. a feeling so good, like you just beat the time of the developer who made the game type feeling.

Feedback always appreciated. 

Also maybe turn down your sound before playing, I'm doing the classic game thing that every game has where the sound is always at 100% when you first play and if you have your headphones turned up max then you go deaf, hahaha always fun.

also check out https://trouble-studios.itch.io/little-trouble-on-tribuba

and https://trouble-studios.itch.io/little-trouble-in-big-japan

other games I worked on.
